text: Goniothalamus simonsii is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Meghalaya in India. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Goniothalamus simonsii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. simonsii Category:Flora of Meghalaya Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Goniothalamus simonsii
